project: Fix CI Release Workflow Auto-Merge Issue
description: release.yml workflow에서 PR 생성 후 auto-merge가 작동하지 않는 문제 해결. 현재 bot이 생성한 PR에 대해 workflow가 skip되어 merge가 진행되지 않음.

userStories.title: Analyze current release workflow issue
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to understand why release PRs are not auto-merging so that I can fix the root cause.
acceptanceCriteria: Root cause identified: `if: ${{ !contains(github.actor, '[bot]') }}` prevents bot-triggered workflows
Understand the skip behavior in release workflow logs
Document why the condition exists and what needs to change

userStories.title: Fix workflow trigger condition for release PRs
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to modify the release.yml workflow so that release PRs created by the bot can still trigger the workflow and merge.
acceptanceCriteria: Update the bot exclusion condition to allow release PR workflows
Ensure release commits still trigger the workflow
Prevent infinite loops (release creating another release)

userStories.title: Test the fixed release workflow
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to verify the release workflow works correctly after the fix.
acceptanceCriteria: Create a test commit that triggers release
